Lobby.description: You hear a fireplace crackling as your eyes slowly adjust to the shimmering light. Before you tower very large doors with embossed signs: The northern portal says "Library", the eastern one "Museum" and the western "Theater". Behind you, in the southern direction leads the stairway into the Wine Cellar.

south.transition: You climb down the stairs into the wine cellar.

west.transition: Through the heavy curtains you enter a desolate theater.

Library.description: The air smeels of dust and paper. The room is dominated by towering bookshelves.

south.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

Museum.description: All kinds of curiosities are exhibited in dusty glass displays. There's a catalogue right next to the door.

west.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

Wine Cellar.description: It reeks of the noblest drops that have since turned into vinegar. To the north is the staircase up into the lobby.

north.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

Theater.description: To the north are what used to be a stage and now resembles an impressive collection of holes in the floor.

east.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

north.transition: You fall through a hole in the stagefloor and find yourself in the wine cellar.
